localization functions getavailablelanguages >>

setlanguage

Changes the language used in Nelson.

Syntax

setlanguage(language)

Input argument

language

a string: 'en_US', 'fr_FR' or others by default.

Description

setlanguage changes the language used by Nelson and saves this changes for subsequent runs of Nelson.

See also

getlanguage.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
